alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 27 at 3:49AM MST until March 01 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM MST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts of 60 to 80 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front, including all of Glacier County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from Noon today to 6 AM MST Monday. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris. Areas of blowing snow are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak wind speeds will decrease Monday morning, then increase again Monday afternoon and overnight.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
